document_data.name: Gorvan Ironheart
document_data.mainbody: '''Gorvan Ironheart''' was a [[dwarf|dwarven]] priest of [[Grumbar]] in the [[Doomvault]] dungeon in [[1486 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Gorvan was interested only in money.
document_data.History: Gorvan was a cleric of Grumbar. He was recruited by the [[Red Wizards of Thay]] to work in the [[Doomvault]] in exchange for a large sum of money. Gorvan helped two Red Wizards to create [[clay golem]]s. In 1486 DR, when the heroes from [[Daggerford]] arrived, he lied to them and claimed to be a prisoner. If the adventurers believed him, he would accompany the party until he found an opportunity to escape.
